document.full_text: movie rental company netflix inc is close to an agreement with miramax to stream the studio's library in a deal that would be worth "well north of" $100 million over five years, according to a source familiar with the deal.
document.title: netflix nears over $100 million deal with miramax: source
lines_and_colors: movie rental company netflix inc is close to an agreement with miramax to stream the studio's library in a deal that would be worth "well north of" $100 million over five years, according to a source familiar with the deal.
